strings.string: Scan Network for LG Smart TV Device...
Type in pairing key of TV device
Pairing with LG Smart TV on IP %s and %s successful. Kodi must be restarted. Would you like to restart Kodi now?
Session not established. Possibly Kodi must be restarted.
There wasn't found any LG Smart Devices on your network. Be sure your devices are turned on or enter IP of LG Smart TV manually.
There seems to be an issue with the used device protocol. Device can't be paired.
Protocol types 'ROAP' and 'HDCP' are not accepted by your device. Can't pair.
No connection to IP address %s. Turn on your LG Smart TV or check your settings.
